name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Darryl D. RAWLS, Appellant

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C.J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Darryl D. RAWLS, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeal dismissed, 276 Pa.Super. 89, 419 A.2d 109, as having been improvidently granted.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: John W. Packel, Chief, Appeals Div., Asst. Public Defender, Karl Baker, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Gaele McLaughlin Barthold, Asst. Dist. Attys., for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
452 A.2d 1347
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Darryl D. RAWLS, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Oct. 25, 1982.
Decided Dec. 10, 1982.
John W. Packel, Chief, Appeals Div., Asst. Public Defender, Karl Baker, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Gaele McLaughlin Barthold, Asst. Dist. Attys., for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C.J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
